spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Elemental-PerlMunger
spec_data.Description:
This Moose role is to be included in classes that rewrite the documentation of
a Perl document, stripping out all the POD, munging it, and replacing it into
the Perl.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:14:02 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Take a string of Perl and rewrite its documentation
